org.openwms.core.configuration.api

Interface ConfigurationApi


  • @FeignClient(name="preferences-service",
             qualifier="configurationApi")
public interface ConfigurationApi
    A ConfigurationApi.
    Author:
    Heiko Scherrer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      reactor.core.publisher.Flux<AbstractPreference> findAll()
      Find and return all existing preferences.
      reactor.core.publisher.Flux<AbstractPreference> findBy(String owner)
      Find and return all existing preferences that belong to one owner.
      reactor.core.publisher.Flux<AbstractPreference> findBy(String owner, PropertyScope type)
      Find and return all existing preferences that belong to one owner and are of one particular type.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<AbstractPreference> findBy(String owner, PropertyScope type, String key)
      Find and return one preference that belongs to one owner and is of one particular type and has the given key.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> update(String pKey, AbstractPreference preference)
      Update the content of an existing preference identified by its persistent key.

    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        @GetMapping(value="/v1/preferences")
reactor.core.publisher.Flux<AbstractPreference> findAll()
        Find and return all existing preferences.
        Returns:
        An infinite stream of all AbstractPreferences

      • findBy

        @GetMapping(value="/v1/preferences",
            params="owner")
reactor.core.publisher.Flux<AbstractPreference> findBy(@RequestParam(value="owner")
                                                                                                                        String owner)
        Find and return all existing preferences that belong to one owner.
        Parameters:
        owner - The owner of the preferences
        Returns:
        An infinite filtered stream of AbstractPreferences

      • findBy

        @GetMapping(value="/v1/preferences",
            params={"owner","type"})
reactor.core.publisher.Flux<AbstractPreference> findBy(@RequestParam(value="owner")
                                                                                                                                 String owner,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                                 PropertyScope type)
        Find and return all existing preferences that belong to one owner and are of one particular type.
        Parameters:
        owner - The owner of the preferences
        type - The type of the preferences
        Returns:
        An infinite filtered stream of AbstractPreferences

      • findBy

        @GetMapping(value="/v1/preferences",
            params={"owner","type","key"})
reactor.core.publisher.Mono<AbstractPreference> findBy(@RequestParam(value="owner")
                                                                                                                                       String owner,
                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                                       PropertyScope type,
                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="key")
                                                                                                                                       String key)
        Find and return one preference that belongs to one owner and is of one particular type and has the given key.
        Parameters:
        owner - The owner of the preference
        type - The type of the preference
        key - The key of the preference
        Returns:
        One single instance

      • update

        @PutMapping(value="/v1/preferences/{pKey}")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> update(@PathVariable(value="pKey")
                                                                                                 String pKey,
                                                                                                 @RequestBody
                                                                                                 AbstractPreference preference)
        Update the content of an existing preference identified by its persistent key.
        Parameters:
        pKey - The persistent key of the preference to update
        preference - The content to update the preference with
